actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the President should grant no pardons with respect to Watergate related offenses or offenses being investigated by the Special Prosecutor.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should not grant blanket pardons with respect to Watergate related offenses or offenses being investigated by the Special Prosecutor.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the President should grant no pardons with respect to Watergate related offenses or offenses being investigated by the Special Prosecutor.
